divs: Sighting DetailsThis incident, with the consent of the witness, is being reported by Investigator Beverly Trout. Witness was on way home from work & incident occurred sometime during time span of 12:30-1:30 a.m., PROBABLY on July 6, 2011. Witness thought shape might indicate that it was the B-2 Bomber at what she considered low level, moving on a straight-line trajectory transit, during which it moved almost overhead her car - she remembers viewing it through her open sunroof. She also observed the object as it continued on its way and passed over a nearby housing development. Object was silent, and had no lights.
Summary: Watched what appeared like B-2 Bomber with no lights move silently almost overhead at low altitude
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Iowa City
There were no other sightings in Iowa City on or around July 6th 2011
